comments.body:
Please add tests for the debugFillProperties method like:
https://github.com/flutter/flutter/blob/master/packages/flutter/test/material/material_test.dart#L61
https://github.com/flutter/flutter/blob/master/packages/flutter/test/material/material_test.dart#L73
This deserves a comment that explains why we're changing the text's foreground color. Or just specify the FAB's foreground color and create `textStyle` with that.  Here and below.
Gotcha, I added a comment explaining the color comes from the color scheme default
